column4: Is there a way to setup my computer so when i start it up, it will automatically log in my account, start up startup programs, then lock screen ?
I probably have to put the "gnome-screensaver" thingy in the startup applications, but it will run everytime i login, not only when i start the PC up
configure your display manager to autologin, then setup your .xinitrc
in your xinitrc you want to run xlock or something like that
